rule-21-17-a.test_description: The project has one building segment with two zones served by a baseline system type 7 with a hot water loop. The baseline boiler efficiency matches the prescibed efficiency based on the capacity range in table G3.5.6.

standard.rule_description: All boilers in the baseline building design shall be modeled at the minimum efficiency levels, both part load and full load, in accordance with Tables G3.5.6.
